creator: cristian.fogel@softvision.ro
summary: Tour - Menu flicker after Tracking protection feature is turned on/off

assigned_to_detail.name: nobody@mozilla.org
assigned_to_detail.real_name: Nobody; OK to take it and work on it

comments.text:
Created attachment 8984954
trackingP_tourFlicker.gif

[Affected versions]:
-Nightly 62.0a1

[Affected platforms]:
- Win 10x64, 
- macOS 10.13,
- Ubuntu 16.04LTS

[Steps to reproduce]:
1. Launch firefox, enable the tracking protection feature;
2. Access https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/62.0a1/tracking-protection/start/?step=3
3. Click next/next until you reach to step 3;
4. Click on Disable protection to this site button;
5. Click on the " > " button;

[Expected result]:
- Site security info is displayed.

[Actual result]:
- Another menu flickers on top for a fraction of a second.

[Regression range]:
- not a regression.

[Additional notes]:
- attached screenshot with the issue
- on Ubuntu, the z-index for menus in the issue seems to be inverted.
comments.author: cristian.fogel@softvision.ro
